column4: While using OpenSSH there are two private key locations: one at /etc/ssh/ssh_host_rsa_key and the other at ~/.ssh/id_rsa Which one is being used?
Both. ssh_host is the host key while id_rsa is the client key.
So there are two sshds running: one for me and one for the host machine?
ie. the client key is what you provide when accessing other ssh servers and the server key is what is used when others connect to your server.
